name: c2ladders
description: Recreation of the famous A2OJ Ladders with updated data from codeforces website.

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm i && cd frontend && npm i && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm i && npm run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/ && cd backend && rm -rf node_modules/ && cd ../frontend && rm -rf node_modules/ && cd ..
